title: Plas Newydd, Angelsey, Wales
brief_description: Plas Newydd, which means “new house”, is the country home of the Marquis of Angelsey, Wales. The film examines this stately home and the present Marquis of Angelsey discusses its history. Part of the series “A Place in Europe”.
